actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill amending the conveyance of property to Mountrail County Park Commission, North Dakota, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to authorize the Mountrail County Park Commission (North Dakota) to designate a portion of specified lands for cabin site leasing. Directs such Commission to reimburse the Government for the leased lands at the fair market value of such property.

titles.title: A bill amending the conveyance of property to Mountrail County Park Commission, North Dakota, and for other purposes.
